website_summaries.verdict: A basic, attractive tub with contemporary looks and an affordable price.
pros: Looks and feels like a high-end model, but comes at an affordable price compared to others in its class
Has nice depth and an overflow
cons: Installation is a bit challenging and the instructions lack details

website_summaries.verdict: This one-person acrylic tub features an antibacterial surface and a comfortable, ergonomic design.
pros: Made from fiberglass-reinforced glossy white acrylic, with an anti-bacterial surface
Ships with both the drain and overflow
Lightweight, and a good fit for one person
cons: Installation instructions could be a little more clear
Some buyers say the inner surface can get pretty slippery when wet

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful tub and feels very luxurious
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tub and feels very luxurious. My husband and I were genuinely surprised at how comfortable it is! It can be a bit intimidating buying such a big item online and unseen in person, but we were pleased with the easy delivery and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: This tub is so pretty and we've had so many compliments on it! It's lightweight so it was easy for the guys to move it in the bathroom. The installation was simple (so they say). It's very comfy and a great size for soaking! I'm petite and it's very roomy, but even a big ole 6 ft tall man can enjoy this tub. We DID change the drain to bronze which was simple but we had to paint the overflow as it can't be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality. Returned 3 tubs.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this Tub 3 times. Do not waste your time ordering and waiting for it to get delivered. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leodia

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive tub!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit afraid to purchase something this big online but am so thankful I did! Love the tub so far!!! See pictures. We are mid construction. It’s set in room but not installed yet. Came in excellent packaging and damage free I’ll post more after fully installed. So far the only suggestion is that they need to offer more finishes in the hardware.we are doing black and white and are planning on pairing them. This tub is by far more attractive than many I have looked at (which is many) and for such a good price! Pure white clean finish. The shape is exactly what I wanted! Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. We ordered this at the beginning of our renovation. It arrived visibly well packaged. It was put in garage for over 5 months. Nothing was ever put on too of it nor it has been moved. When it was time to install it we opened the packaging to our big disappointment - it was cracked and broken in multiple places- all along the edges in top. I was beyond frustrated as it ended up costing me much more to go to store and buy whatever they had as we needed to get it installed same day. Very cheap plastic, don’t buy this crap!
customer_reviews.author: Davit

customer_reviews.title: Hard install, Stress Cracks in Tub
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions were very vague. The expandable drain pipe was not a standard size and I had to modify standard plumbing fittings to make if work. On a scale of one to ten, as ten would be most difficult; I would rate the installation of this tub over concrete floor as a 10. Wood floor with access space would be very easy. I have also noted stress cracks in the tub. I have had it less than a month and it is scheduled to be replaced by Amazon. Disturbing. Empava does not answer the phone or return phone calls or emails
customer_reviews.author: J. Oien

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed with this tub. First of all, let me first say I'm an average adult, 5'6" at 140 pounds. I purchased this tub after reading reviews that stated this was great and comfortable. The tub crackles when sitting in the tub like it's going to break apart. It is extremely short where you can't straighten your legs sitting in the tub. After fixing drain valve now I discovered the jet doesn't work!!. I feel I have completely wasted my money. Very poorly made so it's just an expensive decoration!!
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish on tub
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in November of last year in the tub wasn't set in place until February of 2018 while we did a remodel on her home. The tub is only been used for a few months and as you can see in the photos the finish on the bottom of tub is already starting to deteriorate we never used any harsh cleaners on this tub do not understand why this is happening hopefully the manufacturer will warranty it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: The Drain Will Not Stay Closed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tub - there is no doubt about that! I have friends who want to come to my house to take a bath. However, with the pop up drain being I the middle of the tub, it is nearly impossible for me to take a bath without sliding over it and it popping open. Once open, it is impossible to close without holding it down. So I end up taking a bath with my foot or hand keeping the drain closed. There is no rim to the tub, so I have ordered the bamboo caddy, but the drain issue has ruined this tub for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tub for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have it installed yet but from the dry run it looks pretty awesome. I would love to get a chrome overflow and drain. Update: after a year of use it still looks great and would buy it again. At this price it will not hold water warm for a long time but by the time you’ve soaked for 20 min it’s still warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great tub at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tub. No complaints about installation from my contractor. I'm 5'9" and my wife is 5'1" and fits us both comfortably. Looks really nice. Keeps heat in well too.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Coke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub, but having problems with the 2nd order of this tub.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tub in July, it arrived cracked and poorly packaged. (No box, just wrapped in cellophane) We returned it and reordered. The 2nd one came in September, in beautiful physical condition, & excellently packages but the drain has been sticking since the 2nd week installed. It keeps getting worse to the point now where we have to use a tool to pry it up, to drain water. Hoping we can get ahold of the manufacturer for a replacement drain, & hoping this 2nd purchase isn’t a flop too, because it really is a beautiful tub.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We’re remodeling our master bathroom and got rid of an old built in monstrosity. I don’t take many baths so I just wanted a beautiful tub but didn’t want to break the bank getting one. Went to some bath and kitchen stores and these types of tubs were $3000-$5000. I’m happy with this purchase. It’s lightweight, easy to install. We had a plumber do it to ensure it was correct. It’s great looking and serves its purpose. The faucet ended up costing more than this tub! Came with brushed nickel stopper and overflow which matched our fixtures. Well packaged, no damage when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: S. Daves

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this product today and found out it has a scratch. We want to return the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and deep!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub! Its big and deep. Not heavy and was easy for my guys to install. I was very leery of ordering a bathtub, of all things, off amazon. But it was free shipping, and return looked easy, so I gave it a shot. Very glad I did because I was finding similar tubs all over town but at double the price. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but drain leaks
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star but the drain leaks. It is a Manufacturer issue because after seeing this very thing when I read the reviews prior to purchasing I wanted to use only the best plumber and I still had a leak. My plumber had to come back and change out the silicone ring that comes with the tub drain & seal it very well. Hopefully the manufacturer will look into this problem because it cost my plumber time to come back. With that being said, the tub fits like a glove & I love the contour & design and a great price. Shipped quick and looks gorgeous in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: I loved my Bathtub, but the Jets no longer work after being installed for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I loved my tub, until the jets didn't work any longer, and now I do not know who to contact to return/repair my $1,500.00 bathtub. Truly unhappy now. If Amazon would like to contact my they should send me any email, so we can get this worked out! Please help!
customer_reviews.author: don allen

customer_reviews.title: Well made and east to install
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this soaking tub for our master bathroom. It is very nice looking, modern, and well made. The tub was taller than the average bathtub so we had to take it in through the window. Installation was a breeze, all the knobs and pop up drain plug was already installed. The air jets were more powerful than we expected. The motor is not as quiet as we thought it would be but my wife really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B

customer_reviews.title: ... off of amazon but I did and not it’s amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I ordered a tub off of amazon but I did and not it’s amazing!!!! While it wouldn’t change my purchase, the center drain is annoying if you have small kids. The tub is perfect for bathing them as they can’t climb out but they constantly sit on the drain causing it the open. Like I said, I still wouldn’t change the purchase because it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.text: WE ARE SO HAPPY WITH THIS TUB! My husband and I bought it hoping that we could both fit and it is definitely a two person tub. Easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t schedule the installers until you have it and have inspected it
customer_reviews.text: The tub is excellent. The only reason I took away a star is because it was missing the drain, and the company it ships from doesn’t answer their phones, and after exchanging a few emails with pictures, they never responded back. The first tub was cracked, and a new tub was sent no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tub! We filled the hollow sides with expand foam. It made it hold heat quite a long time. Without that the sides would likely let the heat out quickly. It looked beautiful in our bathroom. Easy to clean. I am a petite woman. At just 5’ 2”the length was about perfect for me. Anyone much taller may find it too small. I’m about 110 lbs and found the tub to be just slightly narrow for my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: It's retail therapy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tub
customer_reviews.text: The tub looks nice but surprisingly light weight. A crack formed along the top lip, which is why we are giving this a 1 star. We will need to replace the already installed tub. Not sure if the Waranty will cover this and if so will change the review. It looks really nice but you can’t have a crack spear on a seam after all the money and time it costs to put in. Big bummer! Update- amazon sent a new replacement tub without too much hassle. The tub is really nice. Just check for damage when it arrives, as we have learned acrylic tubs are pretty light and can crack.
customer_reviews.author: jflak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub,highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I just received my tub and it’s beautiful,i can’t wait to have it installed!I will definitely update with a picture when the project it’s complete!Also I wanted to say that the price dropped since i’ve purchased the tub and I called the seller and I was happy that they offer to credit me back for the difference,very nice costumer service!Thank you so much for that!
customer_reviews.author: NIC

customer_reviews.title: Super relaxing moments
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything I see the only thing that would have topped the quality of this tub would be to incorporate LED lighting to bring one more relaxing moment to enjoying the bathing experience.
customer_reviews.author: brian davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love my tub. Looks great and works so much better than the claw foot I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious look and feel. Very impressive focal point in ...
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious look and feel. Very impressive focal point in the master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub for a great price.  Seems to be well made and has a nice finish.
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time trying to use the flexible drain hose, plus it didn't meet code in our area. Ended up using an OSB IDT 35 Drain system with a hard brass tail piece and it was so easy to install the tub with no chance of drain leak.
customer_reviews.author: Gina H Goodling

customer_reviews.title: No flexibile drain
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful tub. Gives me pleasure just to look at it everyday. The only reason for loss of one star is it did not come with a flexible drain hose as they showed. It required cutting through the floor directly below the drain.
customer_reviews.author: William Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub
customer_reviews.text: I went and looked at several tubs and couldn't believe how uncomfortable most of them were. This tub is comfortable, attractive and about half the price. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Spa Feel
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our jetted tub with this tub and absolutely love it. Spacious and perfect back contouring for comfort. It was easy to install as well. This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: CeeJay

customer_reviews.title: TO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: we have just used this for the first time due to some remodel restrictions and we do NOT like it at all
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The tub is nice looking but the overflow is mounted crooked and is not adjustable. It throws the whole look off
customer_reviews.author: tracy c.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, magazine photo shoot worthy
customer_reviews.text: Wowza, this took decades off our master bathroom. It was stunning. A little challenging lining up the plumbing, but light weight given the size and using 2x4 under it helped accomplished the task. Wee added a grab bar afterwards, for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit :(
customer_reviews.text: The on and off switch is not working...hence cannot even use it. Emailed the Company and all they keep doing is emailing set up instructions. We have got a plumber and 2 electricians to look at...and they all say it is Faulty!!! But cannot get anyone at Emapava to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Gurpreet D.

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tub for a small space and it said it was a deep soaking. I am 5’7”, when I sat in tub, the drain overflow was level with my rib cage. I really wanted the tub to work, it might have if there wasn’t a seat section.
customer_reviews.author: Doris I Berg

customer_reviews.title: SPECTACULAR!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a builder and I buy many bathtubs from different places. And this is by far the most beautiful bathtub that I ordered. The quality seems decent and delivery was fairly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA B.

customer_reviews.title: lousy produce
customer_reviews.text: pool quality run in water keep leaking don"t buy this brand name produce
customer_reviews.author: Jacky C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This tub installed easily and looks great. It’s also very comfortable and deep enough that you can really relax and take a bath instead of sitting there with half your body out of the water. My boyfriend didn’t want to get the freestanding faucet, so he ended up using a different faucet and building a wooden tower for it to go on and it has works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and sound. It looks great! My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: I really love this tub
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tub! It gave my families a great bathing time! The deepth is great so the water doesnt come out, the size is also perfect for our bathroom (we don't have a large one); Also with a fantasitic price!
customer_reviews.author: Yidan Xu

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'm not normally a bathtub girl, mostly because I hate a small tub. I'm 5'7" and a little over-weight. This tub works perfectly for me. This tub looks very elegant too. I was worried about the higher ends but they aren't an outrageous difference in height and it works perfectly in my new bathroom. I also found the tub to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a big save
customer_reviews.text: I had a cooktop of this brand years ago, and it still works aright. very good quality, now it's time to get a new bathtub for our newly remodeled bathroom. I trust this brand, and it didn't let me down. installation was easy and all the tubes were included, meaning you don't have to buy anything else, it saves a lot of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Baker

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can stretch my legs out in front
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can stretch my legs out in front. Only 58 gallons to fill, while comps took 95. I sort of miss having the spot to hook my neck and float without any effort in my ancient, old claw foot. I have popped the drain in the middle accidentally a few times. Getting in and out requires a bit more care because the top is not uniform in height, but I love the esthetics. Question: Where do you find a hair-catching drain cover to go over the monstrously large pop-up drain? It is almost four inches wide, not standard. With waist-length hair, this is a serious question. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: A. Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Remodel Tub
customer_reviews.text: The tub was lightweight and easy to maneuver. Using this for a mobile home remodel. Looks very sleek. Will update after installation and use...
customer_reviews.author: Pughem

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tub
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the quality and the look for the price. The wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Axel I.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: worth the money....totally fit my space perfectly. So lightweight. first one came broken and the company immediately shipped me a new one. it's a perfect, reasonable choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M. Meindl

customer_reviews.title: Bravo Uncle Sam!
customer_reviews.text: What a magnificent bathtub! First, the size is very suitable for our home. Then, the quality is very well made. I mean, I'm 250lbs and stepping on it feel really sturdy. Last, the price is attractive. Overall, I guess there is a difference between made in US and made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bathtub= happy client
customer_reviews.text: This is a big soaking tub! I was able to create what the client wanted at a great price! He has been enjoying soaking in a proper size tub.
customer_reviews.author: mightyheidi

customer_reviews.title: Broken in many places.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with Broken edges! Very poor quality and big waste of my contractors tine!$$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our tenant loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We had to put this tub in urgently for our tenant because their original one was cracked. As it turns out, it works great and our tenant loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: WE have not installed the tub into a newly constructed home yet. So the review is for the looks of the tub only. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phebe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad drain design.
customer_reviews.text: Bathtub is gorgeous but has push in drain to close it and push in o open. The drain is in the middle of the tub, so any time I move, I open the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shape!
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I think this is a beautiful tub. Very ergonomical (at least for my size). Definitely recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice!
customer_reviews.text: It’s look nice! Didn't use it yet. Bathroom still under construction.
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: It is the worst product I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The bubble jet stop working after two months. Amazon never respond back after I email. DO NOT WASTE your money on such a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ling Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Tub
customer_reviews.text: This tub looks simply amazing! It is so elegant. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Walker

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, can only submerge up to my pelvis and I'm 5ft 7 in
customer_reviews.author: Dee Colon

customer_reviews.title: Amazon cancelled the installation
customer_reviews.text: dislike the cancellation of the installation and feel the description of this item is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tub is absolutely beautiful. Great quality too. The perfect size for the space in our master bath!
customer_reviews.author: judy amato

customer_reviews.title: Surface imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few finish imperfects that we had to get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style of this tub and it looks great ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this tub and it looks great in our bathroom! My only critique is that the drain is a push drain to open/close and it's too easy to drain the water on accident while bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Eoff

customer_reviews.title: No issues.
customer_reviews.text: No issue. Description is very accurate. Decent product and people
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD GILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tub
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful tub. My wife and I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfortable use
customer_reviews.text: Installed in master bathroom. This is a great value, considering the price which is less than comparable soaking tubs. -Includes overflow and drain. -Deep soak depth is excellent -Perfect size for our master Looks stunning in our remodel. I'm glad we went with acrylic. Easy to wipe down and keep clean. Arrived early.We are satisfied with the purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tub. Great size and nice finish. Fast shipping and good communication with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Brushed nickel drain and overflow start rusting!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the bathtub and freestanding bathtub faucet! (See pic.1) We tested the faucet and make sure it’s working, water comes out and the tub drains the water, 2 days later when I check the bathtub, the drain and overflow in the tub start rusting! (See pic. 2,3,4) I have not use this bathtub yet because the bathroom is still remodeling, I purchased this based on the good review here, if I knew the quality is this bad, I would go with other brand on Amazon! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: JE

product_meta.title: Empava EMPV-FT1518 67" Acrylic Freestanding Bathtub
product_meta.description: Size:67 InchCome home and relax in your luxurious freestanding bathtub EMPV-FT1518 by Empava. From the serenity collection emerges the ergonomic pure-scape freestanding bathtub by Empava. Its design is as comfortable as it is stylish. The contemporary design and defined lines will complement any bathroom decor and make the room seem more spacious. The pure-scape stand alone tub is ergonomically engineered and will comfortably hold your body, so you can soak in peaceful tranquility. Empava uses 100% white glossy acrylic (never any paint) reinforced with fiberglass in its pure-scape bathtub to ensure that the color is consistent throughout and never fades or loses its brilliance over time. Stand alone bathtub features / specifications: , 66. 92" long x 31. 49" wide x 26. 77" deep and an effective bathtub capacity of 58. 11 gallons. , Adjustable metal feet under tub for stability. , Brushed nickel overflow and pop up drain pre-installed. , surface with high gloss white finish. cUPC certified. , Premium quality acrylic construction reinforced with fiberglass for strength and durability. , Non-porous surface for easy cleaning. , Easy installation. , 1 person bathing. , Chrome plated overflow/drain available upon request (DIY replacement only). , 5 year US based Manufacture . Empava bathtubs are as pleasing to the eye as they are comfortable to soak in. World-class modern designs and ergonomic features are incorporated into all of Empava' s luxury tubs. From the finest selection of raw materials to the contemporary design, Empava bathtubs bring innovation and durability to create some of the highest quality, visually striking bathtubs in the world. Add the Empava modern freestanding bathtubs EMPV-FT1518 to your cart today .
feature_bullets: 🐳 Proudly Made in U. S. A. with 5 Years US Based Manufacture
🐳 Relax and wind down in your Pure-Scape luxurious freestanding soaking tub by Empava, featuring 100% glossy white acrylic and a contemporary stand-alone design that complements any bathroom décor.

🐳 VERSITILE DESIGN – The Empava Freestanding Bathtub can be paired with any tub filler (not included) depending on the style of bathroom you desire. Its modern curved design will match any décor and create a striking focal point in your bathroom.
🐳 ERGONOMIC – The ergonomic design of the Empava EMPV-FT1518 acrylic spa bathtub will comfortably fit.
🐳 DURABLE - The Empava freestanding tub is made out of 100% glossy white acrylic and reinforced with fiberglass for long lasting durability.

🐳 BATHTUB SPECIFICATIONS - Brushed Nickel Drain and Overflow included, Tub Filler excluded. Outer Dimension: 66. 92" Long x 31. 49" Wide x 26. 77" Deep – Effective Tub Capacity: 58. 11 Gallons – cUPC Certified, 5 Years .

🐳 Empava Bathtubs are as pleasing to the eye as they are comfortable to soak in. World-class modern designs and ergonomic features are incorporated into all of Empava’s luxury tubs. From the finest selection of raw materials to the contemporary design, Empava Bathtubs bring innovation and durability to create some of the highest quality, visually striking bathtubs in the world.

specifications.Included Components: Brushed Nickel Drain,overflow, Empava 67" Luxury Freestanding Bathtub EMPV-FT1518, Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
